content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is connected to the nearest electric pole.

### Copper plate mine at position(-21.5, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.5, -73.0) and a furnace at position (5.0, -73.0).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine (not specified in logs).
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position (5.0, -73.0) to the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is present at the specified position. For example, the error regarding the stone furnace at position (-21.5, -73.0) indicates that no such entity exists there.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. The error regarding inserting coal into the working furnace indicates that there was no coal available in the inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
